sources.name: Apple 2023 Sustainability Report
sources.description: Primary input for E2E demo. Contains GHG inventory, renewable energy targets, supplier engagement, governance disclosures.

sources.name: SEC EDGAR Apple FY2023 Item 1A
sources.description: Structured climate, risk, and governance disclosures from the FY2023 10-K filing.

sources.name: CDP Climate Change 2023 (Apple)
sources.description: Board oversight, management roles, transition plan, emissions inventory, and renewable energy commitments.

sources.name: Rubric v3.0 Maturity Specification
sources.description: Single source of truth for 7-theme maturity scoring (TSP, OSP, DM, GHG, RD, EI, RMM)

sources.name: Data Source Registry
sources.description: Registry of Tier-1/2/3/4 data sources (CDP, SEC EDGAR, GRI, CSRHub, direct URLs)

exclusions.name: Live CDP API
exclusions.reason: Network-free demo per CP requirements; use cached data

exclusions.name: Live SEC EDGAR API
exclusions.reason: Network-free demo per CP requirements; use cached data or synthetic

exclusions.name: Production ESG Database
exclusions.reason: PII sensitive; demo uses public reports only

exclusions.name: Vector Embeddings
exclusions.reason: Optional for demo; can use sparse retrieval only
